app_installed_banner_title: Get the app for a better experience.
app_installed_ios_step_1: Tap on the Safari share button.
app_installed_ios_note: Note that web apps on iOS can only be installed using Safari.
app_installed_android_step_2: Tap the three-dot menu in the top right.
app_installed_android_step_3: Tap "Install app" or "Add to Home screen."
